listitem.para: : The fix for this issue might require a re-mapping of (many) UI components for your JavaFX AUT within the Object Mapping Editor. This is necessary as the quality of the (already existing) object mapping information might not be sufficient enough to either find the UI component again (leading to a component not found error during test execution) or to find another one as being more likely (likely leading to odd action errors). Please keep this in mind if you experience problems after switching to this version.
